data.text: I hope #NSEIndia & its MD& CEO Shri Vikram Limaye would respond immediately.  #TOI #DDNewsLive #livemint #dna #ZeeNews #IndiaToday #the_hindu #outlookindia #indiatvnews #mid_day #htTweets #MumbaiMirror #FinancialXpress #DainikBhaskar #NavBharatTimes #timesofindia #AmarUjalaNews https://t.co/UjK1Bw7aY7

.I ask for:

.#NSEIndia cannot retain any amount of money in advance for the claims/grievances/arbitration awards from surrendered members from the date of cancellation of SEBI Certificate.

.Let us not maintain just “contacts” but let us remain “connected “; caring & sharing. https://t.co/7e4PuvwS52

.#NSEIndia has changed the name of Clearing Corporation from the National Securities Clearing Corporation (NSCCL) to NSE Clearing Limited (NCL). Give the reason for the change in name? https://t.co/OzRHC9Qu01

.What is the Award? Can an Award be given on agreed terms? What happens if arbitral award is in favour of investors?

.In which Court is the petition under section 34 of the Arbitration and Conciliation Act 1996 filed?

.At the time of making arbitration application, is the applicant required to deposit any money/fees with the Exchange? What does the respondent do if arbitration application is filed against him? What is counter claim?

.Is it right that #NSEIndia at a click of a button can view the details of any pending investor complaints against trading members from 2009 till to-date?
.What are the different forms/documents used for filing an Arbitration application? What is a statement of case?

Explain what #SEBI Circular asks #NSEIndia to do from the circular dated September 03, 2009?
 Explain what #NSEIndia want to say from your circular dated September 04, 2009?

.Who can apply for arbitration? Within what time are the parties required to approach the Exchange for filing 
Arbitration?
.What is Arbitration? What kind of dispute is covered under by Exchange Arbitration Mechanism? What is the legal framework for arbitration mechanism provided by Exchange?

.Some of the questions to #NSEIndia & its MD & CEO Shri Vikram Limaye: Reply in public space only. 
.My questions to Shri Vikram Limaye are as follows:

.Such refund shall be subject to fulfilment of all dues under Rules/Regulation/Bye-Laws of the Exchange/NSCCL and circulars issued there under including arbitration awards and valid investors/other grievances/claims against them. https://t.co/Ze6IXfhDAc
.The #NSEIndia retains member’s total deposit from the date of cancellation of SEBI certificate for 3 Years. https://t.co/qxPtDHvt4Q

.The #NSEIndia has not maintained the connection with its members. Make changes in the surrender of membership rules & refund the total deposits immediately after cancellation of SEBI certificate for the best interest of its member.
